#summary The user types and their abilities
#labels Assignment2,Feature,Phase-Requirements

There will be three types of user in the program

== Student ==
  # Can play study buddies
  # Can [statistics view their own score]
  # Can change their own password

== Teacher ==
  # Can access all student functions
  # Can add/remove accounts to their class
  # Can import/export study buddies for their class to use
  # Can view [statistics class grades]
  # Can change student passwords

== Administrator ==
  # Can access all student and teacher functions
  # Can create/delete/modify all user accounts
  # Can wipe the entire system
